articles.title: About this blog
articles.contents:
Overview
Worked in the IT industry for 24 years with experience in a
multi-vendor environment in physical and global virtual teams.
Using MS Office products, most recently the Power Query and Power
Pivot tools in MS Excel, to produce high quality views and analysis of
large data sets.
Recently learning the R programming language to analyse large data
sets and to produce data visualisations
Mentoring and coaching colleagues, allowing them to move onto new
career paths and positions
Achievements
Using the R programming language to analysis over 4.5 million rows
of data to identify blockages in processes
Providing senior management with both an overview and detailed view
of outstanding debt
Reducing a daily six hour task to less than 15 minutes per day by
automating email creation for new work requests
Reducing turn around times for client non-standard service requests
from over 80 days to less than 10 working days
Self service tool for users to extract data and present in a variety
of charting formats
A tool to collate estimated prices for work in a consistent format
and to supply summarised reports to clients; identifying stale sales
opportunities worth over $12m
Management of a global Change Request process to monitor and
implement changes from project teams and clients
Testimonials

 Adept at taking
user requirements (usually vague verbal/email requests) and responding
with astutely accurate deliverables. And he delivers quickly to boot
 - Former
Project Manager


 You leave behind
a legacy you can be proud of and that will have a lasting impact on the
careers of all who learned from you.
- Former Team
Leader



LinkedIn   |  

GitHub

articles.title: Projects
articles.contents:
Overview
Here I will post details of data analysis and data visualisation
projects i have been working on.
They will cover a wide range of datasets, and presented in both R and
MS Excel.
